plot: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.
title: Total Recall

tomatoes.consensus: While it boasts some impressive action sequences, Total Recall lacks the intricate plotting, wry humor, and fleshed out characters that made the original a sci-fi classic.

writers: Ronald Shusett (based on the motion picture "Total Recall"
Dan O'Bannon (based on the motion picture "Total Recall"
Gary Goldman (based on the motion picture "Total Recall"
